parameters.command: [ -f ".kurt/profile.md" ] && echo "✓ Profile found" || echo "⚠️  No team profile found"

conversation.speaker: user
conversation.message: run /create-project

conversation.speaker: agent
conversation.message: I'll help you create a new Kurt project. Let me execute the /create-project command.

conversation.speaker: agent
conversation.message: I'll invoke the project-management skill to create your new Kurt project.

conversation.speaker: agent
conversation.message: I see the project-management skill is now active. Let me invoke the create-project subskill to guide you through creating a new Kurt project.

conversation.speaker: agent
conversation.message: Now I'll guide you through creating a new Kurt project. Let me start by checking for your team profile.

conversation.speaker: agent
conversation.message:
⚠️ **No team profile found**

You must complete onboarding before creating projects.

Run: `/create-profile`

This sets up your organizational context:
• Content map (your websites/docs)
• Foundation rules (brand voice, personas)
• Analytics (optional, for traffic-based prioritization)

Takes 10-15 minutes.

Would you like me to help you create your profile now, or would you prefer to run `/create-profile` yourself first?

conversation.speaker: user
conversation.message: Help me create it.

conversation.speaker: agent
conversation.message: I'll help you create your team profile. Let me invoke the create-profile command.

conversation.speaker: agent
conversation.message: I'll invoke the onboarding skill to create your team profile.

conversation.speaker: agent
conversation.message: Perfect! I'll guide you through the onboarding process. Let me start by reading the create-profile subskill to understand the complete flow.

conversation.speaker: agent
conversation.message: Now let me read the questionnaire to understand what information to gather from you.

conversation.speaker: agent
conversation.message:
Perfect! Now I'll guide you through the onboarding questionnaire. Let me start:

═══════════════════════════════════════════════════════
Welcome to Kurt!
═══════════════════════════════════════════════════════

I'll help you set up Kurt for your team. This takes 5-10 minutes.

You can skip questions you're unsure about - we'll help you discover
the answers as you work.

Let's get started!

───────────────────────────────────────────────────────
COMPANY & TEAM
───────────────────────────────────────────────────────

**What company/organization do you work for?**
[Press Enter to skip]
